content.html: One of the most common symptoms of ADHD is hiding yourself, making yourself small and quiet. When we’re young, we learn that our intense ADHD feelings alienate us from others, so shutting down our feelings in order to manage becomes a very logical coping mechanism.
content.value:
One of the most common symptoms of ADHD is hiding yourself, making yourself small and quiet.

When we’re young, we learn that our intense ADHD feelings alienate us from others, so shutting down our feelings in order to manage becomes a very logical coping mechanism.
